name: Ufo Island
description:
Hi everyone, Ufo Island is a short game I have been developing for several months. It is about a Ufo stuck on an island on a different planet. The goal is to explore, solve puzzles, and find lost power modules. I would love to hear your thoughts in the comments. You can also reach out to me on LinkedIn - (https://www.linkedin.com/in/chirag-midha-826337149).

Hope you have fun :)
